subject: feat(ux): add tutorial modal for first-time users
body:
6-step walkthrough that auto-shows on first visit and persists
dismissal in localStorage. Help button in header for re-access.

Steps: welcome → create budget → add expenses → projections →
import actuals → compare plan vs reality.

Follows existing Teleport modal pattern (ConfirmDialog,
InstallInstructionsModal). Composable uses module-level shared
state (same pattern as usePWAInstall).
